name: Ninja Boi: Break Out
description:
Ninja Boi: Break Out.

Created for Ludum Dare 37

It is a small little project where the player controls a ninja in a room, fending off an endless horde of flame spirits. There is no real end goal, but its a nice and fun little game to try. I hope you enjoy it!

A Java JRE must be installed in order to play the game.

Created in libgdx. Art created with Pyxel Editor. Music created in Famitracker. SFX created with bfxr. Let me know what you think!
